Describes the results and uses of each interface.

= Screenshots =

The first interface shows the main preview of the program. The fields are still blank. The user of the interface will input a word in the first text field and will now press the 'Search' button.

The second interface shows the result of the user clicking the 'Search' button. The Result field shows if the user has correctly spelled a word. Then the Definition field will lets the user know the meaning of a certain word.
